title: Sustainable Barefoot Luxury on Tropical Phi Phi Island with Daily Dining YIDU
description: Embrace barefoot Thai luxury at Zeavola Resort, offering award-winning sustainable boutique accommodation on the island of Koh Phi Phi. Located on beautiful Laem Tong Beach, nestled in the north of the island, you’ll enjoy breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea and 10 acres of lush tropical jungle. Wake up to a full buffet breakfast every morning and end each night with a set four-course dinner. You’ll also enjoy shared resort-exclusive round-trip transfers from Phuket, one 30-minute head-and-shoulder massage and one daily cocktail per person.
offer_address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Koh Phi Phi, Ao Nang, Krabi 81000 Thailand

title: Award-Winning Phi Phi Island Luxury Retreat with Daily Breakfast, 4-Course Nightly Dinners & Daily Cocktails
description:
Embrace barefoot Thai luxury at Zeavola Resort amid powdery white-sand beaches, coral-rich turquoise waters and palm-filled, seemingly endless, rainforest. Located on beautiful Laem Tong Beach, in the north of Koh Phi Phi island, the resort makes the most of its stunning natural surrounds, Andaman Sea views and acres of leafy tropical jungle. All of this is seamlessly accessed with included land and sea transfers to the resort, delivering you to paradise with ease. Protecting its island home is at the forefront for Zeavola Resort, which is proud to be one of Thailand's most sustainable resorts.

As a member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, this eco-friendly luxury resort boasts five-star comfort in a rural Thai village setting. Fill your days with exploration and adventure, beach relaxation and spa treatments, plus indulge in authentic, delicious cuisine. Get closer to the magical underwater world at the onsite PADI diving and activity centre, which can arrange unforgettable scuba diving adventures (charges apply). For sunshine-seekers and island lovers, the Phi Phi Islands are in a league of their own and a fantastic alternative to more touristy parts of Thailand.
offer_address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Koh Phi Phi, Ao Nang, Krabi 81000 Thailand

title: Five-Star Phi Phi Island Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Get back to nature and embrace barefoot luxury at Zeavola Resort, a hidden gem located on Ko Phi Phi Don - the main island of Thailand’s Ko Phi Phi archipelago, so beautiful it will leave you speechless. This sustainable haven is framed by 10 acres of tropical jungle, the azure Andaman Sea, and the powdery white sands of Laem Tong Beach. The stunning design of the resort is inspired by an authentic Thai village and balances luxe elements, rustic charm and eco-friendly design, perfectly complementing the verdant jungle surrounds. Wander through the tropical gardens, lounge on a beach beanbag or soak up the sun by the pool with a cocktail in hand before indulging with a massage at the onsite spa.

When hunger strikes, savour authentic Thai cuisine at the resort’s two restaurants, Baxil and Tacada. Beyond the resort, roam the surrounding beaches, visit picturesque Ko Phi Phi Leh and go snorkelling or diving off Bamboo Island.
offer_address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Koh Phi Phi, Ao Nang, Krabi 81000 Thailand

title: Award-Winning Phi Phi Island Five-Star Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Get back to nature and embrace barefoot luxury at Zeavola Resort, a hedonistic hideaway located on Ko Phi Phi Don - the main island of Thailand’s Ko Phi Phi archipelago - so beautiful it will leave you speechless. This sustainable haven, among the top-ranked properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, is framed by 10 acres of tropical jungle, the azure Andaman Sea, and the powdery white sands of Laem Tong Beach.

The stunning design of the resort is inspired by an authentic Thai village and balances luxe elements, rustic charm and eco-friendly design, perfectly complementing the verdant jungle surrounds. Wander through the tropical gardens to seek out your charming villa, lounge on a beach beanbag with a cocktail in hand by the pool, then indulge with a massage at the onsite spa. When hunger strikes, savour authentic Thai cuisine at the resort’s two restaurants, Baxil and Tacada. Beyond the resort, roam the surrounding beaches, visit picturesque Ko Phi Phi Leh and go snorkelling or diving off Bamboo Island.
offer_address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Koh Phi Phi, Ao Nang, Krabi 81000 Thailand

title: Five-Star Phi Phi Island Hideaway with Speedboat Transfers & Daily Dining
description:
Some places are so beautiful they make your jaw drop - Zeavola Resort on Ko Phi Phi Don is one of them. A sustainable island hideaway off the coast of Thailand, framed by 10 acres of tropical jungle, the turquoise Andaman Sea and the powdery white sands of Laem Tong Beach, this Small Luxury Hotels of the World property guarantees ultimate tranquillity.

Take in the rustic romance of the island’s #1 hotel on Tripadvisor and winner of Tripadvisor’s 2020 Traveller’s Choice Award with daily breakfast, your choice of daily four-course lunch or dinner, cocktails per package inclusions, one 30-minute massage per adult and return land and speedboat transfers from Phuket International Airport, as per the resort’s schedule.
offer_address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Koh Phi Phi, Ao Nang, Krabi 81000 Thailand
